vpn-stats-log.name: vpn-stats-log

options.help: IPsec.
options.name: ipsec

options.help: PPTP.
options.name: pptp

options.help: L2TP.
options.name: l2tp

options.help: SSL.
options.name: ssl

vpn-stats-period.help: Period to send VPN log statistics (0 or 60 - 86400 sec).
vpn-stats-period.name: vpn-stats-period

options.help: Enable WCCP cache engine.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable WCCP cache engine.
options.name: disable
